country: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS COUNTRY( countryID CHAR(3) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT '', name CHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',population INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, area FLOAT(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00  , continent enum('Europe','Asia','Africa','North America','Antarctica','Oceania','South America') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Europe' )

city: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS city ( cityID INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , countryID CHAR(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', cityName CHAR(35) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', population INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 , capital TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT false, FOREIGN KEY (countryID) REFERENCES   country(countryID))

language: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS language ( languageID INT(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , countryID CHAR(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' , language CHAR(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' , official TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT true , FOREIGN KEY (countryID) REFERENCES country(countryID)  )
